2. The Matrix Resurrections (2021) - The new Matrix movie is expected to feature groundbreaking visual effects and cutting-edge techniques in martial arts and fight choreography.

3. Dune (2021) - Dune is expected to feature stunning visual effects that bring the epic sci-fi novel to life. The movie is also expected to make use of new technologies in sound design and mixing for a truly immersive experience.

4. The Batman (2022) - The new Batman movie is rumored to feature advanced technologies in costume design and special effects makeup, as well as innovative cinematography techniques.

There are many more movies in the works that are sure to introduce new and exciting technologies, so it's definitely an exciting time for filmmaking.
